item.title: Random Thoughts on My Everyday Life
item.description: 2022.8.31 completed two daily leetcode sql questions 2022.9.1 plan practice pandas before project starts start Titanic project don’t forget matters on google calender actual execution start Titanic Project and has partially completed the initial data exploration finished some matters on google calender that I have been procrastinate a lot before practiced pandas 2022.9.2 plan wake up and get off from the bed at 7:30 finish data visualization of Titanic Project give a bath to cappuccino Oil and Gas from Planet Money
